text: Hey, guys! We're here at
Walt Disney World Resort
to check out the brand new

Guardians Of The Galaxy
Cosmic Rewind at EPCOT,

and to get a look from one of
the Imagineers who created it.

Elle: We're so excited
to be here during

the Walt Disney World
50th Anniversary Celebration.

Christian: And to check out
the brand new
Wonders Of Xandar Pavilion.

- You want to go? All right.
- Let's do it.

Welcome to Guardians
Of The Galaxy Cosmic Rewind.

This is the first
otherworld showcase pavilion

here at EPCOT.
Let's head on in.

- Let's go.
- I'm excited.

- Whoa!
- Welcome to the Galaxarium.

When you step inside
of the pavilion

it's like you're thrown
into another world.

- Whoo!
- Whoa.

Here we start to learn
all about Xandar and Earth,

and how we're more alike
than different.

Christian: The more
we explored the pavilion,

we learned
about the Xandarians,

their culture
and their technology.

Elle: Whoa.
I want to live on Xandar.

Christian:
Right? Me, too.
This pavilion is massive.

There really is nothing
at Disney like this.

- It was amazing.
- ( music playing )

- Whoo! You ready?
- I don't know.

Christian: The Imagineers
invented a whole new coaster.

There is no other coaster
out there like this.

- Whoa!
- Oh, snap!

Elle:
It's called an omnicoaster.

It twists and turns
and puts you
right into the action.
Whoo!

Christian:
It's save the galaxy time!
Aah!

You really feel
like you're in space.
Whoo!

Elle:
It was an amazing adventure

through space and time,
and it was mind-blowing.

- Whoo! That was fun.
- Glad you enjoyed it.
That was so fun.

Christian:
That was so amazing.

I've never experienced
anything like that.

You know what?
I think I'm ready to rewind

- and go on it again.
- Let's do it.
Rewind!
Christian: We saved the day!

Elle: And now
we're honorary Guardians.

- High-five.
- All right.

Christian:
EPCOT takes the real world

and makes it
out off this world.
Both: Rewind!
